# Blood Scent (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 3]], [[2nd Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 2]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 3]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Witch Spells|Witch 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** One creature/2 levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 143

You greatly magnify the target’s ability to smell the presence of blood. The target is considered to have the [[S3.1R-S - Universal Monster Rules R-S (Bestiary 6 Apx)|scent]] universal monster ability, but only for purposes of detecting and pinpointing injured creatures (below full hit points). Creatures below half their full hit points or suffering [[S3.1A-C - Universal Monster Rules A-C (Bestiary 6 Apx)|bleed]] damage are considered strong scents for this ability.

Orcs and any creature under the effects of rage gain a +2 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls against creatures they can smell with this spell, or a +4 morale bonus if the target’s blood counts as a strong scent.
